frege.runtime

Class Array.Int

  • java.lang.Object
    • frege.runtime.Array.Int
  • Enclosing class:
    Array

    public static final class Array.Int
extends java.lang.Object
    Support for int arrays

    • Method Detail

      • arrayGet

        public static final int arrayGet(int[] arr,
           int i)

        Access array element.

        Parameters:
        arr - the int array
        i - the index
        Returns:
        arr[i]

      • arrayLen

        public static final int arrayLen(int[] arr)

        Get array length.

        Parameters:
        arr - the int array
        Returns:
        arr.length

      • arrayNew

        public static final int[] arrayNew(int size)

        Create an array of type int[].

        Parameters:
        size - the size of the array

      • arraySet

        public static final void arraySet(int[] arr,
            int i,
            int v)

        Update array destructively. This method is not pure!

        Parameters:
        arr - the array
        i - index into arr
        v - new value to set at index i

        Changes the passed array, therefore it is not pure. Because the return type is void there is no way to make the frege compiler believe it is pure.
